titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Alison Murphy Conner Papers, circa 1930
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett August 2008

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: The collection consists of a draft of Alison (Murphy) Conner's book Every Which Way in Ireland, published in 1930, concerning her experiences in Ireland accompanying her father on a naturalist expedition.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Alison Barstow Murphy, a 1935 graduate of Vassar College, was born in Brooklyn, NY. Her father was a naturalist on the staff of the American Museum of Natural History and her mother was a member of the Society of Woman Geographers. Alison accompanied her father on many of his expeditions and wrote accounts of their experiences. In 1930, G. P. Putnam published her book, Every Which Way in Ireland, illustrated with photographs taken by Alison and her family. It was part of Putnam's series of books written by and for young people.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a draft of Alison (Murphy) Conner's book Every Which Way in Ireland, published in 1930, concerning her experiences in Ireland accompanying her father on a naturalist expedition.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mrs. Emeline M. Tavenner.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Allison Murphy Conner Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
